name: TND - Valentine's Day DLC
description:
In addition to gloomy Neptune storms and immense cold, love reigns in the air! 

Someone like Emer doesn't recognize her.
But there are people who value this day and want to spend it unforgettably not only for themselves but also for their partner.

Neptunians don't celebrate Valentine's Day. They celebrate the day of Freya - the goddess, who is famous for her fondness of love, fertility, beauty.

Immerse yourself in this day with all your soul and feel the love of Selena, Loui, Helios, and Ren!

AU where Detective completed their mission and lives happily with their partner.
